thread.section_title: Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Central Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Meets the need for a place to stay
thread.title_full: Meets the need for a place to stay - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: travelhappy1127
title: Meets the need for a place to stay
text: Very friendly and helpful staff! Small rooms and the elevators are a problem--lots of folks and luggage waiting, waiting...did I mention WAITING? But, great location sand price for midtown Manhattan. And, the included buffet breakfast is a real bonus!
